text: Madina Colony () is a neighborhood in the Karachi Central district of Karachi, Pakistan. It was previously administered as part of New Karachi Town,Karachi New Karachi Town - Government of Karachi which was disbanded in 2011. There are several ethnic groups in Madina Colony and they include Muhajirs, Sindhis, Kashmiris, Seraikis, Pakhtuns, Balochis, Memons, Bohras, Ismailis, etc. ==References== == External links == * Karachi Website. Category:Neighbourhoods of Karachi Category:New Karachi Town
title: Madina Colony, New Karachi Town
